home.description: Web Development professional with extensive experience in front-end and back-end development, specializing in responsive design, website optimization and creating a seamless and intuitive user experience. Successfully reduced load times and improved site performance through efficient caching and asset optimization while adhering to SEO best practices. Resourceful and can collaborate with other teams to resolve complex technical issues
work2.exp:
Enhanced user experience by implementing responsive web design and optimizing website performance.
Resolved technical issues promptly, ensuring minimal disruption.
Improved site speed by optimizing images, scripts, and other assets.
Reduced server load and improved page response times by implementing efficient caching strategies.

Reviewed code, debugged problems, and corrected issues.
Troubleshot and resolved complex technical issues.

Mentored Junior developers to help them start working on certain features without delay.
